snippet.title: Nyko Raven (Alternative)
snippet.description: Though the Nyko Raven PS3 controller provides an Xbox 360 controller configuration for the PS3, its unresponsive D-pad and bulky feel will have you looking elsewhere.

snippet.title: Paging Raven II, the open-source surgery robot
snippet.description: Developed at UC Santa Cruz and the University of Washington, the Raven II is being tested as a lightweight surgery robot.

snippet.title: Blue Raven Maestro 1070
snippet.description: If you're looking for an iPod speaker system that's big, loud, and affordable, the Maestro 1070 will get the job done.

snippet.title: BlueRaven MediaMate
snippet.description: Blue Raven's MediaMate is a Texas-size product with a down-to-earth price. Just remember, bigger isn't always better.

snippet.title: Blue Raven PSP 15 Hour Extended Battery
snippet.description: If you don't mind the extra bulk, Blue Raven's extended battery for the PSP offers some advantages--from both a cost and convenience standpoint--over buying two extra batteries for your PSP.

snippet.title: Online vector editor Raven joins Aviary's flock
snippet.description: Has the Holy Grail of online image editing hatched? Vectorized online image editing soars with Raven, Aviary's latest design tool.

snippet.title: Interview with Raven Zachary, founder of iPhone Developers camp
snippet.description: Interview with Raven Zachary, founder of iPhone Developers camp

snippet.title: Photos: Blue Raven MediaMate 7000
snippet.description: A CNET review slide show of the MediaMate 7000 portable media player.

snippet.title: Photos: Blue Raven MediaMate 7000
snippet.description: The Blue Raven MediaMate 7000 is a monster portable video player with a 7-inch screen, built-in video recording, and TV-output.

snippet.title: Testing the Blue Raven iPod battery kit
snippet.description: Donald Bell replaces an old iPod battery with one from Blue Raven.
